original_text: Then Kohath's clan started to travel. They were carrying the holy things. Before they arrived at the new camp, the other Levites would put up God's Tent.
korean_text: 고핫인은 성물을 메고 행진하였고 그들이 이르기 전에 성막을 세웠으며

sentences.original_text: Then Kohath's clan started to travel.
They were carrying the holy things.
Before they arrived at the new camp,
the other Levites would put up God's Tent.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 레위 사람들은 하나님의 장막을 세울 것입니다.
